ValidationRule.description: Income Schedule date cannot be more than 45 days in the past.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: TODAY() - Date__c > 45 && $User.Id <> '00530000003A32O' /*Paul Harney*/ && $User.Id <> '005a0000007Wamb' /*Jeff Fahndrich*/ && $User.Id <> '00530000001YEiF' /*Jennifer Valdez*/ && $User.Id <> '0055Y00000I0fox' /*Jennifer Brenner*/ && Income__c <> 0
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Cannot create or edit schedules over 45 days old. To prevent editing older records.
